description: The DevForce Application Framework makes it easy to get started with developing data-driven Rich Internet Applications (RIA) in Silverlight or WPF Desktop Applications, with Caliburn Micro as the MVVM framework and DevForce 2010 as the data access layer.
releaseNotes:
- Breaking Change: A few method signatures with references to IdeaBlade.EntityModel.Entity have been changed to reference IdeaBlade.EntityModel.IEntity in order to support Code First entities.

- New: New EntityQueryOperation.OnComplete extension methods, which attempts to cast a non-typed result to an IEnumerable<T>.
- New: Out of the box debug logging for Caliburn Micro.
- New: Support for Code First in addition to Model First and Database First.
- New: New static method FrameworkBootstrapper.UsesFakeStore<T>() to enable fake backing store initialization in development harness and during login.
- New: XML documentation files built in all configurations.
- New: Includes EntityFramework 4.2 NuGet package. No longer need EntityFramework 4.1 installed to build source code.
- New: Minimum required version of DevForce is now 6.1.4.
- New: Release assemblies available via NuGet.

- Improved: Removed dependency on EntityManager type from FrameworkBootstrapper. 
- Improved: Support for initializing multiple independent fake backing stores.
title: DevForce Application Framework
